Processes/Workflows

A Process is a group of tasks which in most cases must be completed sequentially. Each task can contain multiple steps (Input Documents, Output Documents and Forms). Once the last task in the process has been completed that workflow will also be completed.

Creating a Process

Enter a name, description and select a Category for the new process and click on Create.

Where:

Title: Title of the process. Description: brief description of what is the process about. Category: choose a category to which the process will belong.

Note: It is possible to have several workflows linked together.

Editing a Process

This option allows users to modify process information.

Title Fill this with the name of the process. This field accepts characters which consists of letters, numbers, '_' (underscores), and (-) hyphens. Try not to enter characters like '$', '#', '&', etc. because the process may not be exported then. Description

Fill this with a brief description of what is the process about.

Calendar

Select a Calendar from the list, which indicates the hours and days when users are expected to be at work. You can create your own calendar depending on the work hours.

Process Category

Select one Category from the list which will identify the process. You can create your own category.

Form to show a Case Summary

From the list, choose the form which information will appear on the Case Summary.
